title: BRIEF-Element AI Raises C$200M Series B Round To Transform Commercial Operations Of Company
text:
BRIEF-Element AI Raises C$200M Series B Round To Transform Commercial Operations Of Company

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 13, 2019 06:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Element AI Raises C$200M Series B Round To Transform Commercial Operations Of Company Sept 13 (Reuters) - Element AI Inc: * ELEMENT AI RAISES CAD $200M (US $151.4M) SERIES B ROUND TO TRANSFORM COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS OF COMPANY * ELEMENT AI- INVESTORS INCLUDED CAISSE DE DÉPÔT ET PLACEMENT DU QUÉBEC, MCKINSEY & COMPANY, & RETURNING INVESTORS HANWHA ASSET MANAGEMENT AMONG OTHERS

BRIEF-Element AI Raises C$200M Series B Round To Transform Commercial Operations Of Company
